cleaned_text: Detox Program Sale Sold out Regular price $10.00 USD Regular priceUnit price per Sale price $10.00 USD If you live in an area where re-vaccinations are pushed or a vet refuses to even look at your pet without up to date vaccines, this program is just what you need. We know that over-vaccination in pets is a huge problem and contributes to illness, chronic disease and various health problems. Therefore, it's essential that a detailed, easy to follow vaccine detox plan be part of your pet's health routine. Once we receive your order you will be sent the Vaccine Detox Program pdf. Please allow up to 12 hours to receive your document.
